channel.title: Shops not displaying all items listed?
channel.description: hi im useing the rscali source V2 and makeing a little server for me and some friends. The shops arnt displaying all the items i have listed in source. im useing the disturbed client right now. i like it because it hasent had any problems besides this one. but i think its time to move on. i've tried the matrix 667 client but no matter what i do i cant get it to load past 1% so, could anyone find me a 711 client that WILL work or maybe tell me how to get matrix 667 working or maybe even how to get all items displayed in my current client. thanks a bunch. -Nick

item.title: Shops not displaying all items listed?
item.dc:creator: @babushkahead babushkahead
item.description:
@babushkahead wrote:

u have to delete packedshop.s and then put items wanted in unpackedshops.txt then amout like say this 14484 10
then when u start up server it should pack files automatically

Read full topic
item.source: Shops not displaying all items listed?
